solution_line_template: She will keep {total_tokens} / {keep_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_tokens}/{keep_fraction_denominator}={tokens_for_self}>>{tokens_for_self} Safe Moon tokens for herself.
For the remaining siblings, they will each receive {tokens_for_self} / {num_siblings} = <<{tokens_for_self}/{num_siblings}={tokens_per_sibling}>>{tokens_per_sibling} tokens.

This means that Sandy will have {tokens_for_self} - {tokens_per_sibling} = <<{tokens_for_self}-{tokens_per_sibling}={difference_in_tokens}>>{difference_in_tokens} tokens more than any of her siblings.
